original_text: ‘Do not tell anyone about this,’ Jesus said to him. ‘Instead, go and show yourself to the priest. Take a gift to him for God. Moses taught the people what gift to take to God when they are clean again after this kind of disease. This will show everyone that you are now well again.’
korean_text: 예수께서 그를 경고하시되 아무에게도 이르지 말고 가서 제사장에게 네 몸을 보이고 또 네가 깨끗하게 됨으로 인하여 모세가 명한 대로 예물을 드려 그들에게 입증하라 하셨더니

sentences.original_text: Do not tell anyone about this
Instead, go and show yourself to the priest
sentences.korean_translation: 대신, 제사장에게 가서 너 자신을 보이라

sentences.original_text: Take a gift to him for God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님을 위해 그에게 예물을 가지고 가라

sentences.original_text: what gift to take to God
when they are clean again after this kind of disease
sentences.korean_translation: 이런 종류의 질병 후에 그들이 다시 깨끗해질 때

sentences.original_text: that you are now well again
